verses.verse: Then He said <S%H559><s%> to me, "Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> eat <S%H398><s%> what <S%H834><s%> you find; <S%H4672><s%> eat <S%H398><s%> this <S%H384><s%> scroll, <S%H4039><s%> and go, <S%H1980><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>"
So I opened <S%H6605><s%> my mouth, <S%H6310><s%> and He fed <S%H398><s%> me this <S%H384><s%> scroll. <S%H4039><s%>

And He said <S%H559><s%> to me, "Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> feed <S%H398><s%> your stomach, <S%H990><s%> and fill <S%H4390><s%> your body <S%H4578><s%> with this <S%H384><s%> scroll <S%H4039><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I am giving <S%H5414><s%> you." Then I ate <S%H398><s%> it, and it was sweet <S%H4966><s%> as honey <S%H1706><s%> in my mouth. <S%H6310><s%>

Then He said <S%H559><s%> to me, "Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> go <S%H1980><s%> <S%H935><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> and speak <S%H1696><s%> with My words <S%H1697><s%> to them.

"For you are not being sent <S%H7971><s%> to a people <S%H5971><s%> of unintelligible <S%H6012><s%> speech <S%H8193><s%> or difficult <S%H3515><s%> language, <S%H3956><s%> [but] to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%>

nor <S%H3808><s%> to many <S%H7227><s%> peoples <S%H5971><s%> of unintelligible <S%H6012><s%> speech <S%H8193><s%> or difficult <S%H3515><s%> language, <S%H3956><s%> whose <S%H834><s%> words <S%H1697><s%> you cannot <S%H3808><s%> understand. <S%H8085><s%> But I have sent <S%H7971><s%> you to them who should listen <S%H8085><s%> to you;

yet the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> will not be willing <S%H14><s%> to listen <S%H8085><s%> to you, since <S%H3588><s%> they are not willing <S%H14><s%> to listen <S%H8085><s%> to Me. Surely <S%H3588><s%> the whole <S%H3605><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> is stubborn <S%H2389><s%> <S%H4696><s%> and obstinate. <S%H7186><s%> <S%H3820><s%>

"Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I have made <S%H5414><s%> your face <S%H6440><s%> as hard <S%H2389><s%> as their faces, <S%H6440><s%> and your forehead <S%H4696><s%> as hard <S%H2389><s%> as their foreheads. <S%H4696><s%>

"Like emery <S%H8068><s%> harder <S%H2389><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> flint <S%H6864><s%> I have made <S%H5414><s%> your forehead. <S%H4696><s%> Do not be afraid <S%H3372><s%> of them or be dismayed <S%H2865><s%> before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> them, though <S%H3588><s%> they are a rebellious <S%H4805><s%> house. <S%H1004><s%>"

Moreover, He said <S%H559><s%> to me, "Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> take <S%H3947><s%> into your heart <S%H3824><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> My words <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I shall speak <S%H1696><s%> to you, and listen <S%H8085><s%> closely. <S%H241><s%>

"And go <S%H1980><s%> <S%H935><s%> to the exiles, <S%H1473><s%> to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of your people, <S%H5971><s%> and speak <S%H1696><s%> to them and tell <S%H559><s%> them, whether <S%H518><s%> they listen <S%H8085><s%> or <S%H518><s%> not, 'Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God. <S%H3068><s%>'"

Then the Spirit <S%H7307><s%> lifted <S%H5375><s%> me up, and I heard <S%H8085><s%> a great <S%H1419><s%> rumbling <S%H7494><s%> sound <S%H6963><s%> behind <S%H310><s%> me, "Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be the glory <S%H9202><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> in His place. <S%H4725><s%>"

And I [heard] the sound <S%H6963><s%> of the wings <S%H3671><s%> of the living <S%H9130><s%> beings <S%H9130><s%> touching <S%H5401><s%> one <S%H802><s%> another, <S%H269><s%> and the sound <S%H6963><s%> of the wheels <S%H212><s%> beside <S%H5980><s%> them, even a great <S%H1419><s%> rumbling <S%H7494><s%> sound. <S%H6963><s%>

So the Spirit <S%H7307><s%> lifted <S%H5375><s%> me up and took <S%H3947><s%> me away; and I went <S%H1980><s%> embittered <S%H4751><s%> in the rage <S%H2534><s%> of my spirit, <S%H7307><s%> and the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> was strong <S%H2389><s%> on me.

Then I came <S%H935><s%> to the exiles <S%H1473><s%> who lived <S%H3427><s%> beside <S%H413><s%> the river <S%H5104><s%> Chebar <S%H3529><s%> at Tel-abib, and I sat <S%H3427><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> where <S%H8033><s%> they were living, <S%H3427><s%> causing <S%H8074><s%> consternation <S%H8074><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> them.
Now it came <S%H1961><s%> about at the end <S%H7097><s%> of seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> that the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to me, saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> I have appointed <S%H5414><s%> you a watchman <S%H6822><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> whenever you hear <S%H8085><s%> a word <S%H1697><s%> from My mouth, <S%H6310><s%> warn <S%H2094><s%> them from Me.

"When I say <S%H559><s%> to the wicked, <S%H7563><s%> 'You shall surely <S%H4191><s%> die <S%H4191><s%>'; and you do not warn <S%H2094><s%> him or speak <S%H1696><s%> out to warn <S%H2094><s%> the wicked <S%H7563><s%> from his wicked <S%H7563><s%> way <S%H1870><s%> that he may live, <S%H2421><s%> that wicked <S%H7563><s%> man <S%H7563><s%> shall die <S%H4191><s%> in his iniquity, <S%H5771><s%> but his blood <S%H1818><s%> I will require <S%H1245><s%> at your hand. <S%H3027><s%>

"Yet if <S%H3588><s%> you have warned <S%H2094><s%> the wicked, <S%H7563><s%> and he does not turn <S%H7725><s%> from his wickedness <S%H7562><s%> or from his wicked <S%H7563><s%> way, <S%H1870><s%> he shall die <S%H4191><s%> in his iniquity; <S%H5771><s%> but you have delivered <S%H5337><s%> yourself. <S%H5315><s%>

"Again, when a righteous <S%H6662><s%> man <S%H6662><s%> turns <S%H7725><s%> away <S%H7725><s%> from his righteousness <S%H6664><s%> and commits <S%H6213><s%> iniquity, <S%H5766><s%> and I place <S%H5414><s%> an obstacle <S%H4383><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him, he shall die; <S%H4191><s%> since <S%H3588><s%> you have not warned <S%H2094><s%> him, he shall die <S%H4191><s%> in his sin, <S%H9128><s%> and his righteous <S%H6666><s%> deeds <S%H6666><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he has done <S%H6213><s%> shall not be remembered; <S%H2142><s%> but his blood <S%H1818><s%> I will require <S%H1245><s%> at your hand. <S%H3027><s%>

"However, if <S%H3588><s%> you have warned <S%H2094><s%> the righteous <S%H6662><s%> man <S%H6662><s%> that the righteous <S%H6662><s%> should not sin, <S%H2398><s%> and he does not sin, <S%H2398><s%> he shall surely <S%H2421><s%> live <S%H2421><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> he took <S%H2094><s%> warning; <S%H2094><s%> and you have delivered <S%H5337><s%> yourself. <S%H5315><s%>"

And the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> was on me there, <S%H8033><s%> and He said <S%H559><s%> to me, "Get <S%H6965><s%> up, go <S%H3318><s%> out to the plain, <S%H1237><s%> and there <S%H8033><s%> I will speak <S%H1696><s%> to you."

So I got <S%H6965><s%> up and went <S%H3318><s%> out to the plain; <S%H1237><s%> and behold, <S%H2009><s%> the glory <S%H9202><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> was standing <S%H5975><s%> there, <S%H8033><s%> like the glory <S%H9202><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I saw <S%H7200><s%> by the river <S%H5104><s%> Chebar, <S%H3529><s%> and I fell <S%H5307><s%> on my face. <S%H6440><s%>

The Spirit <S%H7307><s%> then entered <S%H935><s%> me and made me stand <S%H5975><s%> on my feet, <S%H7272><s%> and He spoke <S%H1696><s%> with me and said <S%H559><s%> to me, "Go, <S%H935><s%> shut <S%H5462><s%> yourself up in your house. <S%H1004><s%>

"As for you, son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> they will put <S%H5414><s%> ropes <S%H5688><s%> on you and bind <S%H631><s%> you with them, so that you cannot <S%H3808><s%> go <S%H3318><s%> out among <S%H8432><s%> them.

"Moreover, I will make your tongue <S%H3956><s%> stick <S%H1692><s%> to the roof <S%H2441><s%> of your mouth <S%H2441><s%> so that you will be dumb, <S%H481><s%> and cannot <S%H3808><s%> be a man <S%H376><s%> who rebukes <S%H3198><s%> them, for they are a rebellious <S%H4805><s%> house. <S%H1004><s%>

"But when I speak <S%H1696><s%> to you, I will open <S%H6605><s%> your mouth, <S%H6310><s%> and you will say <S%H559><s%> to them, 'Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God. <S%H3068><s%>' He who hears, <S%H8085><s%> let him hear; <S%H8085><s%> and he who refuses, <S%H2310><s%> let him refuse; <S%H2308><s%> for they are a rebellious <S%H4805><s%> house. <S%H1004><s%>
